roleset.name: increase in value
roleset.note: APPRECIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'appreciate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from appreciate.01-v)

example.name: with EXT
example.text: The brokerage firm tracks technology stocks with its Technology Index, which *trace* appreciated only 10.59% in the first nine months of this year.
example.arg: in the first nine months of this year

roleset.name: esteem, value, have a fondness for, regard judgment
roleset.note: APPRECIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'appreciate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls admire-31.2. (from appreciate.02-v)
APPRECIATIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from appreciative.01-j)
APPRECIATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from appreciated.02-j)

example.name: negated
example.text: Mary does not appreciate John's infantile behavior.

roleset.name: notice, discover
roleset.note: APPRECIATE-V NOTES: Based on Temprel medical data. No VN or FN classes. Comparison to notice. Framed by Katie. (from appreciate.03-v)

example.name: thing (not) found
example.text: [no organomegaly or discrete mass lesions-1] appreciated [*-1]

example.name: both args
example.text: From [what-1] I can appreciate [T-1], there is normal S1, S2 with no murmur.
